Disguise kit

feats.name: Spell Sniper
feats.notes: +60ft for ranged (>10ft) attack spells. Ignore 1/2 and 3/4 cover. Being within 5 feet of an enemy doesn’t impose Disadvantage on your attack rolls with spells.

feats.name: Aberrant (Dragon)mark
feats.notes: When you fail a Constitution saving throw, you can take a Reaction to roll 1d4. When you cast the level 1 spell from this feat, you can expend one of your Hit Point Dice and roll it.

feats.name: Superior Darkvision
feats.notes: Your eyes were made to see through the darkness of the void. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

feats.name: Inconsequential
feats.notes: You are born a mere speck within the endless void of space. You have resistance to necrotic damage.

feats.name: Vacuous Body
feats.notes: A shard of the void is trapped inside of your body and can act as a pocket dimension. As an action, you can store or retrieve inanimate objects from inside it. This dimension can hold up to 30 pounds, not exceeding a volume of 1 cubic foot.

feats.name: Worm Hole
feats.notes: You can step into the hidden paths created by the void. You can teleport up to 25 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see as a bonus action. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

invocations.desc: When you cast Eldritch Blast, add CHA modifier to the damage.
invocations.name: Agonizing Blast

invocations.desc: When you hit a creature with Eldritch Blast, you can push the creature up to 10 feet away from you.
invocations.name: Repelling Blast

invocations.desc: When you cast Eldrictch blast, its range increases by a number of feet equal to 30 times your Warlock level.
invocations.name: Eldritch Spear

invocations.desc:
Alter Self (Conc. up to 1 hr) Choose one effect. Use a Magic action to switch effects during the spell.

Aquatic: Breathe underwater; Swim Speed equals ground Speed.

Appearance: Change physical look, voice, and species (must keep same size/shape). Stats do not change.

Weapons: Grow Claws, Fangs, or Horns. Unarmed Strikes deal 1d6 (Slash/Pierce/Bludgeon). Use Spellcasting Mod for hit/damage.
invocations.name: Master of Myriad Forms

invocations.desc:
Concentration, up to 10 min You rise vertically up to 20 feet and remain suspended. Max weight 500 lbs.

Vertical Move: You can change your altitude by up to 20 feet as part of your Move.

Horizontal Move: You can only move laterally by pushing or pulling against a fixed object (treat as Climbing).

Ending: You float gently to the ground when the spell ends.
invocations.name: Ascendant Step

invocations.desc:
While you’re in an area of Dim Light or Darkness, you can cast Invisibility on yourself without expending a spell slot.

Concentration, up to 1 hour

A creature you touch has the Invisible condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.
invocations.name: One with Shadows

invocations.desc: Bonus Action. Link minds with a seen creature within 30 ft. You can communicate telepathically (shared language required) up to CHA mod miles (min 1). Lasts Warlock Level minutes. Ends if used again.
invocations.name: Awakened Mind

invocations.desc: When you cast a Warlock spell that deals damage, you can change its damage type to Psychic. In addition, when you cast a Warlock spell that is an Enchantment or Illusion, you can do so without Verbal or Somatic components.
invocations.name: Psychic Spells

invocations.desc: When bonding via Awakened Mind, force target to make WIS save. Fail: It has Disadvantage attacking you; you have Advantage attacking it for bond duration. Recharge: Short/Long Rest or expend Pact Slot (no action).
invocations.name: Clairvoyant Combatant

name: Asphoros Morgrem

spells.name: Eldritch Blast
spells.notes: 2 Beams (Level 8) , push 10ft (R.Blast)

spells.name: Hex
spells.notes: If the target drops to 0 Hit Points before this spell ends, you can take a Bonus Action on a later turn to curse a new creature.

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.notes: You teleport to a location within range.

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.notes: For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself.

spells.name: Hypnotic Pattern
spells.notes: You create a twisting pattern of colors in a 30-foot Cube within range.

spells.damage: 3d8 damage + 1d8 for each higher spell slot
spells.name: Chromatic Orb
spells.notes: Via Aberrant Mark | Choose Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, or Thunder for the type of orb you create.f you roll the same number on two or more of the d8s, the orb leaps to a different target of your choice within 30 feet of the target

spells.name: Acid Splash
spells.notes: Via Aberrant Mark | You create an acidic bubble at a point within range, where it explodes in a 5-foot-radius Sphere.

spells.name: Witch Bolt
spells.notes: On each of your subsequent turns, you can take a Bonus Action to deal 1d12 Lightning damage to the target automatically, even if the first attack missed.

spells.name: Confusion
spells.notes: Each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point you choose within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw, or that target can’t take Bonus Actions or Reactions and must roll 1d10 at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior for that turn, consulting the table below.

spells.name: Hunger of Hadar
spells.notes: A 20-foot-radius Sphere of Darkness appears, centered on a point with range and lasting for the duration. The Sphere is Difficult Terrain.Any creature that starts its turn in the area takes 2d6 Cold damage. Any creature that ends its turn there must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 Acid damage from otherworldly tentacles.

spells.name: Clairvoyance
spells.notes: You create an Invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you (a place you have visited or seen before) or in an obvious location that is unfamiliar to you (such as behind a door, around a corner, or in a grove of trees).

spells.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
spells.notes: On fail it laugh, each turn tries to break from it

spells.name: Phantasmal Force
spells.notes: On a failed save, you create a phantasmal object, creature, or other phenomenon that is no larger than a 10-foot Cube and that is perceivable only to the target for the duration. The phantasm includes sound, temperature, and other stimuli.

spells.name: Dissonant Whispers
spells.notes: half demage on fail

spells.name: Detect Thoughts
spells.notes: Sense Thoughts. Or Read Thoughts.

spells.name: Hex I
spells.notes: Once per long rest

spells.name: Minor Illusion
spells.notes: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration.

spells.name: Mage Hand
spells.notes: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

spells.name: Banishment
spells.notes: transported to a harmless demiplane for the duration. While there, the target has the Incapacitated condition. When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

spells.name: Erase Remembrance
spells.notes: The creature must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or you erase one of its memories. You can choose to make it forget an event, a person, or a piece of information, lasting up to 10 minutes of its memory. For a spellcaster, this could cause them to forget one of their prepared spells, forcing them to choose a new one after a long rest. This lost memory can only be restored by a greater restoration or wish spell. Once you use this property, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.

spells.name: Change Battle Rhythm
spells.notes: If the creature is not willing, it must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or you can change it's initiative in a fight by 1d4. If the creature is willing, you can do the same without the saving throw. This can make the creature skip it's turn or make the creature go twice in one turn. You can use this property twice per long rest.

spells.name: Fear
spells.notes: Each creature in a 30-foot Cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and have the Frightened condition for the duration.

spells.name: Misty Step
spells.notes: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

spells.name: Charm Monster
spells.notes: It does so with Advantage if you or your allies are fighting it. On a failed save, the target has the Charmed condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.
